entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of drizzle. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to periods of drizzle this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
